definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
we are honored by your presence

sentences.english: It is but a day's journey from this place, and it waits for thy coming.
sentences.chinese: 戒指在離這裏不過一日行程的地方，恭候您的大駕。

sentences.english: The Prince of Darkness does not condescend to such cheap drudgery.
sentences.chinese: 這種下賤的差使，根本用不着勞“黑暗之王”的大駕。

sentences.english: We had to wait almost an hour before he condescended to see us.
sentences.chinese: 我們等了幾乎一小時他才屈尊大駕來見我們。

sentences.english: Please don't go out your way.

definition: lit. to use the eastern wind (idiom)/fig. to use sb's help
to hold a lamp/to light a lamp
area above the lintel of a doorway
to cross (a road, an ocean etc)/to cut across
embroidered headband used as decoration by actors or in Hui ethnic group/to reward an actor with brocade headband
